videos.title: Gravel Road Biking Paradise: Patagonia, AZ | Spirit World 100
videos.description:
Welcome to Patagonia, Arizona — a true gravel road biking paradise in the heart of the Borderlands. 🌵🚲✨
The Spirit World 100 brings riders into a landscape of rolling ranch roads, wide-open valleys, and rugged southern Arizona scenery that feels like another world.

Whether you’re lining up for your first gravel event or chasing big miles, this weekend is built for adventure.

📍 The Spirit World 100 — Patagonia, AZ
🗓️ Nov 5–8, 2026
🚴 Distances: 30 / 58 / 80 / 100 miles
🌵 Gravel roads + big views + community vibes

👉 Full schedule + details: thespiritworld100.com/schedule

#SpiritWorld100 #PatagoniaAZ #GravelRoadBiking #GravelCycling #Borderlands #RideArizona #GravelRace

videos.title: The SPIRIT WORLD LOOP. - Patagonia AZ. The spirit of gravel lives here.
videos.description: The Spirit of Gravel is alive and well in Patagonia AZ! This small town of 1.3 square miles, and a population of less than 900, will welcome you with a Lumber Company that serves coffee, beer, wine, food truck fare, and live entertainment. The bike shop is open Friday - Sunday, and has a booklet of the best gravel loops in the area. I highly recommend making the trip, it's one hour south of Tucson.

videos.title: 72 Hours In Patagonia, Arizona
videos.description:
If you’ve stepped into gravel cycling lately, chances are you’ve heard of “Patagonia.” No, not that Patagonia. This small Arizona town, nestled 18 miles north of the US-Mexico border boasts some of the country’s best gravel roads, breakfast burritos, and community gathering spaces. 

Ending Song Credits: "In A Black Out" by Lundi Knight
